keyword: how many calories in frozen yogurt
title: How Many Calories in Frozen Yogurt?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in frozen yogurt per 100g serving, including carbs, protein, fat, and nutrition breakdowns for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in Frozen Yogurt?
assumptions: Plain, low-fat frozen yogurt; soft-serve style, no added toppings or flavors.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content, flavor, and serving size. Check labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: 100g of plain frozen yogurt contains about 120 kcal and 4g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for straightforward comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a cup of frozen yogurt?
faqs.a: About 200-250 kcal for a standard 1/2 cup (125g) serving, depending on fat content.

faqs.q: Is frozen yogurt lower in calories than ice cream?
faqs.a: Often yesâ€”plain frozen yogurt has ~120 kcal per 100g vs. ~200 kcal for full-fat ice cream.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in frozen yogurt?
faqs.a: Around 22g per 100g, mostly from sugars like lactose and added sweeteners.
Yes, about 4g per 100g from the yogurt base, making it a decent snack option.

faqs.q: How does flavor affect calories in frozen yogurt?
faqs.a: Fruit flavors add ~10-20 kcal per 100g; chocolate or cookie varieties can add 30+ kcal.
